   vyatimiśraḥ | tasmāt tarhi mahārāja ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya	vyatimiSraH | tasmAt tarhi mahA rAja ekAnta kRzNAni karmANi apAsya
   vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ | ity evaṃ vo	vyatimiSrANi ca, ekAnta Suklezu eva karmasu ABogaH karaNIyaH | iti evam vaH 
   bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam* ||	BikzavaH Sikzitavyam* ||
        atha rāhā aśoka āyuṣmataḥ sthaviropaguptasya bhāṣitam	aTa rAhAH aSokaH AyuzmataH sTavira upaguptasya BAzitam
   abhinandyānumodya utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ ||	aBinandya anumodyaH utTAya AsanAt prakrAntaH ||
